string-array.name: prompts
string-array.item: "Imagine your favorite fictional character has the same problems as you and write about how they'd solve them"
Imagine your anxiety as a monster and write a story about it
Write a letter to a friend
Imagine your friend is going through the same thing as you. Write them a letter of advice
Make a list of what is making you feel anxious right now. Make a larger list of things you are thankful for
List everything you can see right now. List everything you can hear. List what you can feel, smell, and taste
Draw a picture of your anxiety as a monster. Then destroy it
Take 5 minutes a write down everything that comes into your mind. Then destroy it.
